{{Description|A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.}}
'''Instructor's Cap''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Instructor]].

==Description==
"I don't have the talent to command an army as its general,<br />Nor am I qualified for anything beyond being a soldier.<br />All I can do is to be a strict instructor to these children,<br />So that they might survive on the battlefield a bit longer."
